projectDetails: PMIS Project is for Government of the Peopleâ€™s Republic of Bangladesh Ministry of Planning. The e-PMIS is fully digital transformation of Project Management, Monitoring and Evaluation functionality of IMED. The e-PMIS is single web portal where all the stakeholders related to Project Management can perform project related activities using a dedicated secured web-based dashboard. The solution is based on Microservice - also known as the microservice architecture - is an architectural style that structures an application as a collection of services that are:
